body.p: Jaffe’s Presents… Le Gant’s Fashion Parade For Spring The “Sta-Up-Top” Alphabet Corseletter Half-size Corselette A’lure Alphabet Brassiere Mother and daughter alike are superbly corseted in Le Gant Foundations. No matter what your figure problem there is a Le Gant model that will “do things” for your figure. Corselettes Girdles, $1.50 to $10.00 Make Jaffe’s Corset Department your headquarters for Le Gant and take advantage of our Professional Fitting Service at “no extra cost.” Stop in or Call 5 for an Appointment JAFFE’S
